class_description: When a host app sends a request to an app extension, it provides an extension context. For many app extensions, the most important part of the context is the data the user wants to work with, which is contained in the inputItems property.

Vars.var_description: Posted when the extension’s host app moves from the inactive to the active state.
Posted when the extension’s host app moves from the active to the inactive state.
Posted when the extension’s host app begins running in the background.
Posted when the extension’s host app begins running in the foreground.
